name: Side Crunch
how_to_perform:
1. Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground, parallel to each other.

2. Slowly lift your shoulders off the floor by engaging your core muscles. Keep your hips and lower back in contact with the ground throughout the exercise.

3. As you lift your upper body, exhale and extend your right arm straight up towards the ceiling. At the same moment, bring your left elbow towards your right knee, while keeping your legs together.

4. Hold the position for a brief pause, focusing on engaging your core and stabilizing your body.

5. To return to the starting position, slowly lower your upper body back down onto your back, exhale, and extend your arms back by your sides.

6. Repeat the exercise on the other side by switching the arm that is extended towards the ceiling and bringing the opposite elbow towards your knee.

7. Continue alternating sides with each repetition, keeping your core engaged and your lower body stable throughout the exercise.
short_summary: The side crunch is a core strengthening exercise where a person lies on their back and lifts their shoulders off the ground, extending one arm upwards while bringing the other elbow towards their opposite knee.
